name: Bugs vs. Bots
description:
Plants vs. Zombies towerdefence alike game. 

Crazy Scientist has driven off the bots who has messed up his home. Now they are coming back to her house and they need to be stopped! Help the lady to defend the house by using her Mut-Ants as defence. There is also playable minigame in Extra's menu, check it out and post your own highscores in comments section!
